so the Weapon Pack is the reason why the game Crash all the time ???

ive beat it 100%. the only problem SO FAR is the weapon pack dlc. the rest (costumes and perks) are okay. no videos intro or credits ripped. IT'S THE FULL GAME AND IT'S ALREADY UPDATED TO 1.1! i'm still trying to find a solution to the weapons crash.
